review: The Amazon fire stick is a huge improvement for streaming Amazon prime video and movies over the internet.  The ability to search and identify Amazon content with the fire stick is much better than the interface on our older "smart TV", and the interface is also faster and more reliable, since we can use a 5 ghz Wi-Fi connection which is about twice as fast as the standard 2.4 ghz Wi-Fi connection to our main TV set.  Moreover, it supports more content than our smart TV allowed, and I am able to stream ESPN and ESPN2 sports content by way of our Sling TV subscription.  However, the NETFLIX channel interface is subpar, so we use a computer directly connected to the TV set to stream Netflix movies and TV shows, rather than the fire stick, for this data source.  (Hence, the four star review instead of five stars.)
author: Anthony W.
